events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car with another vehicle at a traffic light intersection.
After review, the claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the reported car collision.
An agent has been assigned to handle the claim and will contact the customer shortly to discuss next steps.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and confirmation was sent to the customer to ensure receipt.
The customer was requested to submit the police report, photos of the damage, and a copy of the driver's license.
Customer promptly submitted all requested documents including police report and photographs of the damaged vehicle.
Investigation has commenced to verify the collision details and inspect vehicle damage for accurate assessment.
Investigation successfully completed, confirming the collision circumstances and validating submitted evidence.
A settlement proposal outlining estimated repair costs and compensation has been sent to the customer for review.
Customer responded positively, agreeing with the terms of the proposed settlement and expressing satisfaction with support.
The claim has been approved based on the investigation and customer's acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account promptly.
The claim has been officially closed following the successful payment and resolution of the accident damages.
